reference:
titanic is saved as a data frame.
Used to assess risk ratios
description:
Description
The data is an observation-based version of the 1912 Titanic passenger survival 
log,
title: titanic

parameters.class: a factor with levels 1st class 2nd class 3rd class crew
parameters.age: a factor with levels child adults
parameters.survived: a factor with levels no yes
parameters.sex: a factor with levels women man

format: A data frame with 1316 observations on the following 4 variables.
